price: So We took revenge on them; see what was the end of the deniers!
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
